long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chicken Merge is an engaging game available as a Chrome extension. In this game, players are tasked with merging and evolving chickens to create new and more powerful breeds. Start with a few basic chickens and strategically combine them to unlock rare and exotic species. As you progress, you'll encounter different challenges and obstacles that require careful planning and decision-making. The goal is to create the ultimate flock of chickens with unique abilities and characteristics. With its addictive gameplay and cute graphics, "Chicken Merge" offers hours of entertainment. You can play this game for free on the website https://classroom-6x.org/. So, gather your virtual chickens and embark on an exciting merging adventure in "Chicken Merge."

*Note: We have added "Classroom 6x, Poki Unblocked" button, making it easy for players to quickly access the games on our website https://classroom-6x.org, https://poki.ee
